app.title: Secure QR & Link Scanner
scan.select.title: Select Scan Type
scan.select.subtitle: Choose what to scan and start a secure analysis.
scan.code.description: Scan and verify QR/Barcodes with camera.
placeholder_text: Enter text or a URL above; your QR code will be generated automatically.
info_text: QR codes can contain URLs, text, phone numbers, email addresses, and more. Up to 2,953 characters are supported.
qr_generation_error: Could not generate the QR code. Please try again.
scan.image.description: Scan codes from a selected photo.
scan.noCodeFound: No code found in this image
scan.info.title: Information
scan.info.description: The app analyzes QR codes and links on-device. Results are heuristic and may not be definitive.
history.title: History
history.description: View and manage your past scans
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Change theme, language, and preferences here.
settings.premiumDesc: Go ad-free for a faster, cleaner experience.
consent.title: User Consent & Legal Disclaimer
consent.p1: Analysis is performed on-device using heuristic checks. Results are indicative, not guarantees.
consent.p2: This does not replace professional security tools or your own judgment.
consent.p3: You remain solely responsible for any actions taken based on the app's output.
consent.p4: The developer provides the app "as is" without warranties and assumes no liability for losses, damages, or legal claims arising from use.
consent.p5: No data is sent to external servers; processing occurs locally, subject to platform limitations.
consent.p6: By tapping "I Agree", you acknowledge and accept this disclaimer. If you do not agree, please exit the app.
classifier.brandMismatchWarning: Brand keyword does not match domain
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
camera.permission.message: Camera access is required to scan codes
scan.footer.text: All scans are processed on your device; no data is shared.
download_unavailable_detail: Saving an image requires an extra module. It works on Web; on native we can add SVG/extra module support.
consent.mediaAccessMessage: Allow access to your gallery to pick an image.
alerts.offline: No internet connection. Better analysis is available online.
remoteRisk.defaultMessage: This link appears on external security risk lists. Proceed with caution.
scan.guide.align: Align the QR code or barcode within the frame
confirm.openMessage: Are you sure you want to open this link?
